content.text: Match ends, Almería 2, Girona 1.
Second Half ends, Almería 2, Girona 1.
Rubén Suárez (Almería) is shown the yellow card.
Felipe (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rubén Suárez (Almería).
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Isaac Becerra.
Attempt saved. Rubén Suárez (Almería) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Jonathan.
Attempt missed. Toni Moral (Girona) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left.
Goal!  Almería 2, Girona 1. Charles (Almería) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jonathan with a cross.
Attempt missed. Felipe (Girona) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Toni Moral.
Substitution, Almería. Rubén Suárez replaces Fernando Soriano.
Jonathan (Almería) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Hand ball by Jonathan (Almería).
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by David García.
Attempt blocked. Christian Fernández (Almería) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Charles with a headed pass.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by Moisés Hurtado.
Attempt missed. Charles (Almería) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Mejía.
Eloi Amagat (Girona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mejía (Almería).
Attempt saved. Iago Falque (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Moisés Hurtado (Girona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Charles (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Moisés Hurtado (Girona).
Substitution, Almería. Mejía replaces Corona.
Offside, Almería. Charles tries a through ball, but Jonathan is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Toni Moral (Girona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Chus Herrero.
Substitution, Girona. Eloi Amagat replaces Jofre.
Attempt missed. Gerard Bordas (Girona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Toni Moral.
Foul by Adrián Gunino (Almería).
Gerard Bordas (Girona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Adrián Gunino (Almería).
Jofre (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Almería. Jonathan replaces Aleix Vidal.
Foul by Moisés Hurtado (Girona).
Charles (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, Girona. Richy replaces Luso because of an injury.
Corner,  Almería. Conceded by José.
Attempt missed. Toni Moral (Girona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Marcos Tébar.
Isaac Becerra (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charles (Almería).
Substitution, Girona. Toni Moral replaces Javier Acuña because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Iago Falque (Almería) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Verza.
Jofre (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Verza (Almería).
Attempt missed. Christian Fernández (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Iago Falque.
Attempt saved. Fernando Soriano (Almería) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Iago Falque with a cross.
Fernando Soriano (Almería) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Moisés Hurtado (Girona).
Attempt blocked. Iago Falque (Almería) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Corona.

First Half ends, Almería 1, Girona 1.
